item.title: About
item.description:
I have been a system administrator specializing in UNIX systems and networks for over 12 years. For the last 4 years I’ve worked at an innovative hardware company that makes enterprise flash products (to be used by system administrators).

My latest role is that of Performance Engineer, where I’ll be diving into the challenges of instrumenting at a system level, observing bottlenecks, and coming up with strategies and best practice for removing those bottlenecks. I’ll be working with the supremely smart people dedicated to our All Flash Array (AFA) product, and my aim is to help make our AFA the best in the industry.

This site serves to document the things I learn along the way.
